Code: EXEC SQL SELECT t2.nrcertif, t1.nome_razao, t1.cgccpf, t2.nrpropos, t2.dtqitbco FROM seguros.v0cliente t1, seguros.v0cliente t2, seguros.v0cliente t3 WHERE t1.nome_razao like :VGV0W001.W01A0043 AND t2.codclien = t1.cod_cliente AND t2.NUM_APOLICE = t3.num_apolice AND t2.codsubes = t3.codsubes AND t3.CODPRODAZ = 'AES' END SQL
